channel.title: Full slayer helmet/Pernix Graphical glitches. [PI]
channel.description:
[B]Well when I have The Full slayer helmet equipped it extends my head up and my neck is clear. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2jb8osj.jpg[/img]
And Pernix armour is a bit invisible in some areas of the character. [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/14934ol.jpg[/img] [B]
